name: metal-claw
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to raise the user’s Attack one stage.
short_effect: Has a 10% chance to raise the user’s Attack by one stage.

flavor_text.x_y: The target is raked with steel claws. This may also raise the user’s Attack stat.
flavor_text.omega_ruby_alpha_sapphire: The target is raked with steel claws. This may also raise the user’s Attack stat.
